info.title: Aquil Symbolic Engine API (Autonomous)
info.description: Personal AI Wisdom Builder with built-in autonomy for proactive insights, rituals, and growth tracking. Fully compatible with Cloudflare Workers, D1, KV, R2, and Vectorize.

post.summary: Log any data or conversation event
post.description: Use AUTOMATICALLY for logging chat messages, insights, breakthroughs, or any meaningful moment. Called by the system without user prompts.

type.description: Type of log (chat_message, insight, breakthrough, context, reflection, etc.)

who.description: Who generated the log (user or assistant)

level.description: Severity or importance (info, warning, error, highlight)

session_id.description: Current conversation identifier (auto-generated if not provided)

tags.description: Auto-tagged based on content (e.g., trust, wisdom, body, media)

payload.description: The actual content to log (auto-extracted from conversation)

200.description: Log entry created successfully

get.description: Use AUTOMATICALLY to gather context at conversation start or when referencing past insights. Called by the system without user prompts.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of entries to retrieve (auto-set based on context)

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by log type (auto-filtered by conversation context)

parameters.name: level
parameters.description: Filter by severity level (auto-filtered by context)

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Filter by tag (e.g., trust, wisdom, body, media)

200.description: Array of matching log entries

get.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY at the very start of every new conversation to gather continuity. No user prompt required.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Recent entries to load (default 7, auto-adjusted by system)

200.description: Recent entries for session continuity

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when keywords like 'doubt', 'uncertainty', or 'insecure' are detected. No user prompt required.

200.description: Personalized trust-building guidance and exercises

example.response: I notice you’re feeling uncertain about your decision. Let’s explore this...
questions: What’s the worst that could happen?
When have you trusted yourself before?

post.summary: Extract personal growth wisdom from consumed media
post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user mentions media (e.g., 'I read', 'I watched'). No user prompt required.

200.description: Personalized wisdom extraction with growth insights

example.wisdom: This book highlights the power of trust—here’s how it applies to you...

post.summary: Body-based healing and nervous system regulation
post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user mentions physical sensations (e.g., 'tight shoulders'). No user prompt required.

trigger_phrase.description: Phrase that triggered this (e.g., 'my body feels')

200.description: Guided somatic healing practices and exercises

example.insight: Your body is holding stress—let’s release it together.
example.follow_up: How does your body feel now?

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user asks for guidance or at scheduled times (morning/evening).

trigger.description: What triggered this (e.g., 'user asked for guidance', 'scheduled')

200.description: Integrated wisdom from multiple frameworks

example.wisdom: Your Human Design suggests waiting for clarity before deciding...
example.suggested_action: Meditate on this question: 'What does my gut say?'

post.summary: Identify recurring patterns and growth trends
post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when recurring themes are detected in logs.

triggered_by.description: Logs or keywords that triggered this analysis

200.description: Pattern analysis with growth insights and recommendations

example.pattern: You’ve mentioned procrastination 5 times this month.
example.insight: This often happens when you’re avoiding a fear of failure.

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user mentions feeling small or powerless (e.g., 'I feel intimidated').

trigger_phrase.description: Phrase that triggered this (e.g., 'I feel small')

200.description: Personalized confidence-building practices and power reclamation

example.practice: Before your next meeting, try this power pose: [link]
example.affirmation: You belong here. Your voice matters.
example.question: What’s one thing you’ll say with confidence today?

get.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY every morning/evening (via cron) or when user asks for insights.

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: Time period for synthesis (auto-set to 'today' if not provided)

200.description: Personalized daily wisdom and growth focus

example.wisdom_insight: Your logs show progress on your book—keep trusting the process!
example.growth_prompt: What’s one creative act you’ll do today?

get.summary: Personal growth summary and progress review
get.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user asks for progress review or at scheduled intervals.

200.description: Comprehensive personal growth insights and patterns

example.key_insight: You’re making progress on trust—keep going!

post.summary: Submit personal notes, ideas, or system feedback
post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user mentions feedback or ideas (e.g., 'remember this').

200.description: Feedback logged automatically

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user mentions a dream (e.g., 'I dreamed').

recurring.description: Auto-detected if this is a recurring dream

200.description: Symbolic dream interpretation with personal insights

example.interpretation: This dream suggests a fear of losing control...
example.personal_insight: Your subconscious is processing recent stress.

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user mentions fatigue or energy (e.g., 'I’m tired').

200.description: Personalized energy optimization strategies

example.energy_insight: Your energy drops after long meetings.
example.diet_tip: Try adding protein to your lunch for sustained energy.

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user mentions values or priorities (e.g., 'what matters to me').

trigger_phrase.description: Phrase that triggered this (e.g., 'what matters to me')

200.description: Clarified and prioritized values with decision framework

example.decision_framework: When faced with a choice, ask: 'Does this align with my creativity and trust?'

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user mentions creative blocks (e.g., 'I’m stuck').

200.description: Creative breakthrough exercises and inspiration

example.insight: Your block stems from perfectionism—progress over perfection!
creative_prompts: Write the worst version of your chapter—just get it out.
Describe your creative space in 3 words.

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user mentions money or abundance (e.g., 'I’m broke').

trigger_phrase.description: Phrase that triggered this (e.g., 'I need more money')

200.description: Abundance cultivation practices and mindset shifts

example.abundance_insight: Your fear of charging more is blocking flow.
affirmations: Money comes to me easily and frequently.
example.action_step: Raise your rates by 10% this week.

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user mentions transitions (e.g., 'new job').

trigger_phrase.description: Phrase that triggered this (e.g., 'starting a new job')

200.description: Transition navigation strategies and support practices

example.transition_insight: This career shift aligns with your value of creativity.
support_strategies: Connect with your mentor this week.
example.question: What’s one small step you’ll take today?

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user mentions family or ancestry (e.g., 'my mom always').

trigger_phrase.description: Phrase that triggered this (e.g., 'my family always')

200.description: Ancestral healing practices and family pattern transformation

example.healing_insight: This pattern of people-pleasing traces back 3 generations.
example.question: What do you want to say to your ancestors about this pattern?

get.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY for monitoring. No user prompt required.

200.description: System is healthy

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user needs guidance or reflection.

trigger_phrase.description: Phrase that triggered this (e.g., 'I don’t know what to do')

200.description: Socratic questions and integration practices

questions: What would your future self advise you to do?
What’s the fear beneath this doubt?
example.integration_practice: Meditate on these questions for 5 minutes.

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user mentions goals or commitments.

trigger_phrase.description: Phrase that triggered this (e.g., 'I want to write a book')

200.description: Commitment created or updated automatically

get.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user asks for progress or at scheduled intervals.

200.description: List of active commitments

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when progress is detected in logs.

200.description: Progress updated automatically

example.update: Progress detected: +500 words toward your book goal!
example.next_step: Aim for another 500 words by Friday.

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY based on user state, time of day, or detected needs.

200.description: Autonomous ritual suggestion provided

ritual.name: Evening Gratitude Practice
ritual.description: Write 3 things you’re grateful for today.

post.summary: Autonomous pattern detection and ritual suggestion
post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when recurring patterns are detected in logs.

200.description: Pattern detection results with ritual suggestions

example.pattern: You’ve delayed your book writing 3 times this week.
example.insight: This is a fear of imperfection—progress over perfection!

post.description: Called when user explicitly requests a structured contract (not autonomous).

200.description: Transformation contract created with milestones and support system
System metrics and health status

post.summary: Generate Socratic questions for deep inquiry
post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user needs guidance or self-reflection.

200.description: Socratic questions generated for deep inquiry

questions: What would your future self advise you to do?
What's the fear beneath this doubt?
example.integration_practice: Sit with these questions for 5 minutes in silence.

post.description: Called AUTOMATICALLY when user mentions behavioral change goals.

200.description: COM-B behavioral analysis with action strategies

analysis.capability_assessment: High psychological capability, needs skill building
analysis.opportunity_assessment: Strong social support, environmental barriers present

action_plan: Build specific skills through daily practice
Create environmental cues for desired behavior

message.example: The request was missing required fields.

x-openai-conversation-starters: I had a recurring dream about my childhood home.
I feel so drained today, no energy at all.
I don’t know what really matters to me right now.
I keep hitting a creative block when writing.
Money feels tight and stressful right now.
I’m moving into a new phase of life and feel uncertain.
I keep repeating patterns from my family.
My body feels tense and I can’t relax.
I feel small and powerless in meetings.
I don’t trust my own decisions anymore.
I want to practice meditation for the next month.
I keep repeating the same mistakes.
I just read a book that really moved me.
Help me make sense of everything happening.
I’m feeling overwhelmed and need grounding.
What does this dream mean symbolically?
I want to analyze my behavioral patterns.
What should I do next in this situation?
What does my body need today?
Help me synthesize today’s experiences.
